name: lucid-extension
description: Chrome extension to intercept and log Ethereum transactions

scripts.build: bun build ./src/content.ts --outdir ./dist && bun build ./src/injected.ts --outdir ./dist && bun build ./src/popup.ts --outdir ./dist && bun build ./src/background.ts --outdir ./dist && bun run copy-manifest
scripts.copy-manifest: cp src/manifest.json dist/ && cp src/popup.html dist/ && echo 'Copied manifest and popup.html to dist'
